title: the Obsidian Reach
intro: Iyla is a high-priest of Chandrasar, the Bastion of the Lunaries, a race of four-armed mortals who dwell in the moon's shadow. Tall, graceful, and eerily pale, she wields four Chakrams with hypnotic precision. On the battlefield, she is a whirlwind of silver steel, keeping enemies at bay with a constant flow of blades that return to her many hands like loyal servants.

abilities.name: Quad-Wielding Rhythm
abilities.details: Every 4th basic attack of Iyla deals bonus magical damage (scaling with physical power and magical power).

abilities.name: Crescent Convergence
abilities.details:
Iyla throws two chakrams that travel in opposing outward arcs before meeting at a target location. The blades deal physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies they pass through.

Upon reaching the meeting point, the blades snap together, dealing bonus physical damage (scaling with physical power) and slowing enemies in a small area before returning to Iyla.

The returning blades deal reduced damage.

abilities.name: Lunar Guard
abilities.details:
Iyla plants her feet and holds her chakrams in a defensive stance for a short duration. While in this stance, she blocks all basic attacks and takes reduced damage from the enemies.

The damage reduction does not apply for damage-over-time.

abilities.name: Moonphase Shift
abilities.details: Iyla blinks to a target location. If there is a nearby enemy hero, Iyla will perform a whirlwind slash, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Perfect Alignment
abilities.details:
Iyla enters a state of perfect alignment for a few seconds, gaining a massive burst of attack speed.

During this time, her attack speed cap is removed, and every basic attack now launches all four chakrams in rapid succession.

Each chakram deals physical damage (scaling with physical power) and applies on-hit effect separately.
